title: Drinking Boys and Girls Choir - Performance & Interview (Live on KEXP at Home)
description:
http://KEXP.ORG presents Drinking Boys and Girls Choir sharing a live performance recorded exclusively for KEXP and talking to Larry Mizell, Jr., host of The Afternoon Show. Recorded December 1, 2021.

Songs:
There is no spring
Odoby
Secret Revenge
National Police Shit
Linda Linda

Session performed and recorded at Platform Chang-dong 61
Video by Sugarsaltpepper Production
